body.name: Apple MacBook Air MD711LL/B 11.6-Inch Laptop (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Renewed products look and work like new. These pre-owned products have been inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers, which typically perform a full diagnostic test, replacement of any defective parts, and a thorough cleaning process. Packaging and accessories may be generic. All products on Amazon Renewed come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty.
Up to 9 Hours of Battery Life, OS X Mountain Lion
1.4 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 (Turbo Boost up to 2.7GHz) with 3MB shared L3 cache
11.6-inch LED-backlit glossy widescreen display; Intel HD Graphics 5000
128 GB PCIe-based flash storage, 4 GB 1600 MHz LPDDR3 Memory
body.description: This 11.6-inch model of the MacBook Air (MD711LL/B) sports up to 9 hours of battery life, a 1.4 GHz Intel Core i5 dual-core processor (with a Turbo Boost of up to 2.7 GHz), 128 GB of flash memory storage, and 4 GB of RAM (see full specifications below). It also includes both a high-speed Thunderbolt port and two USB 3 ports, enabling you to easily connect to external displays and a wide variety of high performance peripherals. The MacBook Air is powered by OS X Mavericks, the world's most advanced operating system and built to bring out the best in your Mac. And the MacBook Air comes pre-loaded with the latest version of the iLife software suite (iPhoto, iMovie, and GarageBand) as well as the iWork productivity suite (Pages, Numbers, and Keynote). Up to 9 Hours of Battery Life Power through your whole work day with the 11-inch MacBook Air, which delivers up to 9 hours of battery life - more time power for word processing, presentations, email, and more. The increase is due to a larger battery (thanks to the compact all-flash storage in the MacBook Air) and the new power-efficient Intel Core processor architecture. Put the MacBook Air to sleep for more than 3 hours, and it enters standby mode to conserve battery life for up to 30 days. 802.11ac: The New Definition of Fast The MacBook Air supports ultrafast 802.11ac Wi-Fi. When connected to an 802.11ac base station - including the new AirPort Extreme and AirPort Time Capsule - wireless performance is up to three times faster than with the previous generation of MacBook Air. And your Wi-Fi range improves as well. Flash Memory Storage By replacing the standard spinning hard drive typically found in laptops (as well as desktop PCs) with flash memory, the MacBook Air delivers an almost instantaneous boot-up when you open the display, as well as faster application launches and snappier overall performance. Additionally, Apple has shed the enclosure that typically surrounds flash memory (usually about the same

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, perfect condition
reviews.reviewText: Great laptop, perfect condition, works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this MacBook Air so I could work on my European trip. Perfect for carry-on only travel. Enough memory, battery power, and storage to get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size for personal use
reviews.reviewText: Nice size. I use this for personal use. It’s working good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily one of the best machines ever made.
reviews.reviewText: Posting this comment using my MacBook Air..all I can say is it is GREAT!! There are no fancy frills, and what it does, it does fast and efficiently...it's nice and light and TINY which makes moving around with it less of a chore. Overall, I would give it a solid 9.5/10. Maybe the size of the screen is not for all, but for students and people who are constantly on the go, this would be the computer to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as described!
reviews.reviewText: This company sent me three computers in a row, after each one turned out defunct. They assured me that Garageband and iMovie would be available on each one, as described, and it wasn't on any. Hard to believe it was an honest mistake, with three computers in a row!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the product but for some reason it would not let me finish setting it up. I ended up having to send it back. I was so dissapointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I was a little scared at first about this but it works great and did come with a warranty.. Very nice!
I got the laptop in a prefect condition .... packaging was awesome .... I am using the laptop for couple of months now without issues.

Perfect little laptop for throwing in my bag and working out of office on days I need to travel. Works beautifully now that I have wiped the HDD and installed a more current OS. This step was necessary in order to install the apps and software I use for my job and the only issue I had with this purchase.At the end of the day it was worth the $$$ spent on an older model.

reviews.reviewTitle: WARNING: DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THESE PEOPLE
reviews.reviewText: This product was absolute garbage unfortunately. It wasn’t refurbished at all. The screen was all just pure glitch and you couldn’t see anything on the screen once it turned on. These people should probably be out of business for trying to pass a scratched up (UNCLEANED) and completely dead computer onto someone as if they are “Amazon” which is exactly how they try to sell themselves In the description. I honestly was so shocked about this as they claimed to inspect everything that goes out the door and said everything was guaranteed. Was majorly dissapointing. And amazing hasn’t even issued a refund yet, it’s all just a major pain in the ass to be honest

it did not have enough information only when i received i saw it was a 2014 refurbished - and the memory was only 4GBi will be returning it as i saw newer more powerful ones for lesser price. I bought this because Amazon had it on as a lightning special deal. Unless i am not understanding something.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heavily damaged and not up-to date product
reviews.reviewText: I wish they had zero or - stars. I ordered 2 laptops for my kids. Both Laptops were in rough shape and were not even working properly.
